title: Benton Sans
content:
Submitted by [Joe Pemberton](http://web.archive.org/web/20100114142414/http:/typophile.com/user/1160 "View user profile.") : 18.Dec.2003 3.58pm 

[Press release from Font Bureau]   
   
**BENTON SANS**   
   
Font Bureau is proud to release Benton Sans.   
   
 [http://www.fontbureau.com/BentonSans/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100114142414/http:/www.fontbureau.com/BentonSans/)   
   
Benton Sans is a direct descendent of America's best Gothic type.   
This dignified workhorse family of 26 styles already fills the   
design requirements of such diverse publications as the LA TIMES,   
GUITAR WORLD, and BUSINESS WEEK.   
   
Come see the evolution of an American classic:   
   
 [http://www.fontbureau.com/BentonSans/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100114142414/http:/www.fontbureau.com/BentonSans/)   
   
Best Regards,   
   
Harry, Samantha & Robb   
 [typesales@fontbureau.com](mailto:typesales@fontbureau.com)   
The Font Bureau, Inc.   
326 A St., Suite #6C   
Boston, MA 02210   
   
617 423 8770 (voice)

author: Joe Pemberton
